title: Sirloin beef, chips, baby beetroot and spinach
description: Look for Aberdeen Angus sirloin for this simple steak recipe served with the rainbow colours of baby beetroots, golden beetroots and spinach.
ingredients: 4 sirloin steaks (preferably Aberdeen Angus), including the bones separate
1 bunch baby golden beetroots, leaves removed
1kg/2lb 4oz chipping potatoes, peeled and cut into 1x5cm/½x2in sticks
